raw: T o b i a s S c h m i d t  Personal Information  Gender Male Age 40 Nationality Austrian Location Graz, Austria  Summary Highly experienced and accomplished engineer with a proven track record in project management and plant engineering. Holds a Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering from a prestigious university. Extensive expertise in the design and implementation of technically complex projects, particularly in the automotive industry. Exceptional leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills.  Education Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering  Technical University of Graz, Austria Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering Technical University of Graz, Austria Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering Technical University of Graz, Austria  Experience Senior Project Engineer Global Automotive Solutions GmbH  Led the planning and execution of major projects, including the development of cutting-edge test facilities and research laboratories.  Managed multi-disciplinary teams and ensured project milestones were met on time and within budget. March 2014 – Present (10 years) Graz, Austria  Project Manager Leading Engineering Firm  Oversaw the design and construction of advanced test bench systems and plant facilities for automotive research and development.  Provided technical expertise and guidance to junior engineers. January 2009 – January 2014 (5 years) Zurich, Switzerland  Languages  English Fluent German Native
